name: boomcrunk
description:
Boomcrunk is a match-3 puzzle game with uncontrollable element. Use your mouse to match 3 of any like tile to clear groups of tiles. Match the 3 golden tiles to win.

Created for the GMTK 2020 game jam.

Programming - Sam Trapp
Art - Clay Brooks

Sound - Justin Ankenbauer

source - https://github.com/setrapp/GMTK_Jam_2020
